org.transitime.ipc.servers

Class PredictionsServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.ipc.rmi.AbstractServer
      • org.transitime.ipc.servers.PredictionsServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, PredictionsInterface

    public class PredictionsServer
extends AbstractServer
implements PredictionsInterface
    Implements the PredictionsInterface interface on the server side such that a PredictionsInterfaceFactory can make RMI calls in order to obtain prediction information. The prediction information is provided using org.transitime.ipc.data.Prediction objects.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.transitime.ipc.interfaces.PredictionsInterface

        PredictionsInterface.RouteStop

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static PredictionsServer start(java.lang.String agencyId,
                                      PredictionDataCache predictionDataCache)
        Starts up the PredictionsServer so that RMI calls can query for predictions. This will automatically cause the object to continue to run and serve requests.
        Parameters:
        agencyId -
        predictionDataCache -
        Returns:
        the singleton PredictionsServer object. Usually does not need to used since the server will be fully running.

      • get

        public java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(java.lang.String routeIdOrShortName,
                                                          java.lang.String stopId,
                                                          int predictionsPerStop)
                                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: PredictionsInterface
        Returns list of current predictions for the specified route/stop.
        Specified by:
        get in interface PredictionsInterface
        predictionsPerStop - Max number of predictions to return for route/stop
        Returns:
        List of PredictionsForRouteStop objects for the route/stop, one for each destination

        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • get

        public java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(java.util.List<PredictionsInterface.RouteStop> routeStops,
                                                          int predictionsPerStop)
                                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: PredictionsInterface
        For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop. Since expensive RMI calls are being done this method is much more efficient for obtaining multiple predictions then if a separate get() call is done for each route/stop.
        Specified by:
        get in interface PredictionsInterface
        Parameters:
        routeStops - List of route/stops to return predictions for. Uses route short name or route ID
        predictionsPerStop - Max number of predictions to return per route/stop
        Returns:
        List of PredictionsForRouteStop objects for the route/stop. There is a separate one for each destination for each route/stop.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getAllPredictions

        public java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> getAllPredictions(int predictionMaxFutureSecs)
        Description copied from interface: PredictionsInterface
        Returns all predictions. This is intended for clients such as the GTFS-RT vehicle update feed that outputs all predictions by trip.
        Specified by:
        getAllPredictions in interface PredictionsInterface
        Returns:
        List of all PredictionsForRouteStop objects for system. There is a separate one for every route/stop/destination.

      • get

        public java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(Location loc,
                                                          double maxDistance,
                                                          int predictionsPerStop)
                                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: PredictionsInterface
        Returns predictions based on the specified location.
        Specified by:
        get in interface PredictionsInterface
        Parameters:
        loc - The user's location
        maxDistance - How far a stop can be away from the loc
        Returns:
        List of PredictionsForRouteStop objects for the location. There is a separate one for each destination for each route/stop.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
